effects.display_string: Set: Mortal Strike and Cleave increase the damage of your next Overpower by 10%.
Set: When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Mortal Strike or Cleave has its damage increased by 10% and critical strike chance increased by 10%, stacking up to 2 times.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Unleash your inner tempest to gain 8,239 Strength for 15 sec. Your next 3 abilities cause a lightning blast dealing 374,372 Nature damage to your primary target. Damage increased by 100% with each subsequent blast. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,086, up to 10,432.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.8 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
